reviewText: When I see National Lampoon in the title I don't expect too much , but I was pleasantly surprised at how good this film was. I think most of the negative reviews of this movie come from those who like the usual junk that National Lampoon puts out, and since  this movie is well written, acted and directed it puts them off. If you're someone who enjoys a well written character study over bathroom humor, I think you'll enjoy this film.
summary: I just watched this movie on Hulu.

reviewText: This movie, based on a true story, was enjoyable to watch.  Unfortunately, it is not closed-captioned so many hearing-impaired people will not be able to watch it.

reviewText: Totally watchable and enjoyable film, both for it's comic and dramatic aspects. A nice change to see a film that doesn't feature a car chase or a bullet-proof leading man. Also worth mentioning is the soundtrack, with features a nice selection of classic rock tunes. The "Won't Get Fooled Again" segment alone warrants seeing this film!

reviewText: This movie is a surprise. Much funnier than you would expect with great characters. I really liked this movie a lot.
